website_summaries.verdict: Small wallet with money clip works well to block RFID for those who only need to carry a few cards.
pros: Money clip uses four magnets to hold your bills in place securely
Genuine leather yields a soft feel that you'll appreciate
A slim travel wallet that fits in your front pocket comfortably
Includes a card display window for a driver's license or other ID card
cons: Very small wallet area that won't work for people with numerous RFID cards

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: So far, after 10 days of using, sitting in my back pocket with about 10-15 bills clipped, all card slots filled to the brim ( I have about 10 cards), it seems like a great product so far, I'll update it if an issue arises. Unlike the cheap versions of these wallets, there is no wrinkling of the leather, no cheap adhesive holding the compartments together to cause residue on your cards, and best of all, I can actually slide out my ID card easily. This wallet is great if you need a minimalist wallet and you don't carry many cards, just the bare essentials like credit cards, insurance cards (for emergencies), and some gift cards!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Trieu

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet, unnecessary magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Overall solid wallet. Extremely thin and no excess pockets. The width is just near that of a dollar bill (see pic). The magnet is the only thing I am not to crazy about. I thought that it would be more rigid, not as flappy (see picture). The only use I see for the magnet is for cash, which, I do not have most of the time. If you happen to have a lot of cash on you most of the time this I would reccomend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt R. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me as I only carry about 5 cards ...
customer_reviews.text: First money clip I’ve ever bought. Works great for me as I only carry about 5 cards total between I.D. and credit cards. Beware I found that the magnet can erase hotel door keys so make sure you carry hotel key in different pocket.
customer_reviews.author: William Burr

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have used this clip for one week. It is sturdy, comfortable and provides easy access to my license, credit cards and cash. It is substantially more functional than the last money clip I had.
customer_reviews.author: thorax

customer_reviews.title: Strong money clip
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and he LOVES it. The money clip is strong and the card holder is thin enough for him to carry in his front pocket. He's had several guys at his work ask him where he got it.
customer_reviews.author: LuvMyDogs

customer_reviews.title: It is also made out of great quality. I would definitely recommend this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves this new wallet. He hates wallets but this is so sleek and small that he's changed his mind. It is also made out of great quality. I would definitely recommend this wallet.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wallet
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is great. You can stuff it and the profile stays slim. I think it can hold all the cash you need unless you need a lot of singles.

customer_reviews.title: Good item!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend. He loves it! Very good quality and no defects. Love the color and style. And its small but not too small. Fits all his cards and easy to slide in/out of his pocket. Definitely recommend it! :)

customer_reviews.title: great quality, a little longer than i like
customer_reviews.text: great quality, a little longer than i like, but fits great in my front pocket. Credit cards are a little tough to get out, but not too bad. Good product for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Great money clip wallet for the price. Really strong magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. The magnet is extremely strong. I travel for work and will often have 10-15 receipts along with some cash and yet the magnet holds everything securely.

Nothing on their end more Amazon but they where very helpful.

product_meta.title: Garigolden Money Clip, Leather RFID Blocking Wallet for Men
feature_bullets: Size and Features: Marry Christmas gifts ,The wallet is 4.4”x 2.8” x 0.18” and fits nicely in your front pocket. Come with 3 card slots, a change pocket and an ID display window with thumb push pad for quick access.
Powerful Magnetic Money Clip: With 4pcs strong magnets, this money clip can hold plenty of bills and cards, better than normal ones which is only 2pcs magnets.

Genuine Leather: Made with the Finest Full Grain genuine leather, looks classy and very slim which makes it the essential travel wallet for every man. The slim wallets for men offer the ultimate style and comfort for any occasion in a gentleman's life. It's the perfect gift for men.

RFID Blocking Wallet: Keeps your vital information in cards from being stolen. Does block 13.56 MHz frequency (credit cards, debit cards, driver license and ID cards), does NOT block 125 KHz frequency.
Our Guarantee: We offer a full 90 days 100% money back or free replacement. Please do not hesitate to contact us for any other issues regarding our products or services.
